title: Add ahead/behind to wt list output
description: Enhance wt list to show upstream ahead/behind counts per branch. Add git helper(s) to compute counts and include them in list formatting for clean/dirty worktrees. Handle detached HEAD and missing upstreams gracefully.

title: Expand integration coverage for list and rm safety behavior
description: Add integration tests for list ahead/behind output and rm safety flows, including dirty worktree handling, unmerged commit detection, confirmation behavior, and --force bypass.

title: Strengthen wt rm safety checks and confirmation flow
description: Enhance wt rm to detect unmerged commits before removal and require interactive confirmation for unsafe removals (dirty or unmerged) unless --force is provided.
